select count(1) as tot_cnt2 from tb_userinfo tu join tb_ad ta on tu.loginID = ta.loginID join tb_detail_code tdct on ta.ad_type = tdct.detail_code and tdct.group_code= 'ad_type' join tb_detail_code tdcex on ta.ad_type = tdcex.detail_code and tdcex.group_code= 'resume_experience' join tb_detail_code tdcsa on ta.ad_type = tdcsa.detail_code and tdcsa.group_code= 'resume_salary' join tb_detail_code tdced on ta.ad_type = tdced.detail_code and tdced.group_code= 'education' join tb_detail_code tdcst on ta.ad_type = tdcst.detail_code and tdcst.group_code= 'ad_status' where user_type = 'B'
and tu.name Like CONCAT('%', #{nm_search}, '%')

select 100 * count(tu.name)/ifnull(s.grp_cnt,1) pct, tu.name ent from tb_ad ta cross join (select sum(a.cnt) as grp_cnt from (select count(tal.ad_no) as cnt, ta.loginID from tb_ad_like tal join tb_ad ta on ta.ad_no = tal.ad_no group by ta.loginID) as a) as s join tb_userinfo tu on ta.loginID = tu.loginID join tb_ad_like tal on ta.ad_no = tal.ad_no group by ta.loginID

select count(1) from tb_fair tbf join tb_detail_code tdc on tbf.fair_location = tdc.detail_code and tdc.group_code = 'location' join tb_detail_code tdc2 on tbf.fair_companyNum = tdc2.detail_code and tdc2.group_code = 'fair_companyNum'
where tbf.fair_title Like CONCAT('%', #{nm_search2}, '%')

select tfj.fair_no fno2, tdc.detail_name sex_fc, count(tu.user_sexuality) sex_fcnt from tb_fair_join tfj join tb_fair tfa on tfj.fair_no = tfa.fair_no join tb_userinfo tu on tfj.loginID = tu.loginID join tb_detail_code tdc on tu.user_sexuality = tdc.detail_code and tdc.group_code = 'user_sexuality' where tu.user_sexuality is not null and tfj.fair_no = (select tbf.fair_no fno from tb_fair tbf join tb_detail_code tdc on tbf.fair_location = tdc.detail_code and tdc.group_code = 'location' join tb_detail_code tdc2 on tbf.fair_companyNum = tdc2.detail_code and tdc2.group_code = 'fair_companyNum' limit 1) group by tu.user_sexuality
